alert.note: Alert for Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:53PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Neosho County through 730 PM CDT... At 653 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Paul, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Erie, St. Paul and South Mound. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
